title: How to write a 30-minute blog post - Quora

response.answer_text: Create a content calendar. If you're blogging once or twice a week, brainstorm and jot down some topics to write about and insert them into a calendar that extends into the next couple of months. ...Categorize your content. ...Start crafting a post a week in advance. ...Think about links and mentions. ...Set aside time to write

First of all, writing blog post doesn't depend on time it depends on your content. If you want to write a post, first of all do research on the topic, collect as much information as possible then try to write post.
